org.modelio.api.modelio.meta

Interface IMetamodelService


  • public interface IMetamodelService
    Expert for all Metamodel concerns.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IMetamodelI18nSupport getI18nSupport()

    • Method Detail

      • getMetaclass

        @Deprecated
java.lang.Class<? extends MObject> getMetaclass(java.lang.String metaclassName)
        Deprecated. Since Modelio 3.4 use getMetamodel().MMetamodel.getMClass(String)
        Get the Xxxx interface java class corresponding to the given metaclass name.
        Parameters:
        metaclassName - a metaclass name.
        Returns:
        The I class or null if the requested metaclass cannot be found..

      • getMetaclassName

        java.lang.String getMetaclassName(java.lang.Class<? extends MObject> metaclass)
        Returns the textual name of a metaclass.
        Note: The returned name is NOT i18n'd.
        Parameters:
        metaclass - the metaclass whose name is sought, or null if the given class is not a metaclass.
        Returns:
        the textual name of the metaclass.
        See Also:
        MMetamodel.getMClass(Class)

      • getInheritingMetaclasses

        java.util.List<java.lang.Class<? extends MObject>> getInheritingMetaclasses(java.lang.Class<? extends MObject> metaclass)
        Get the metaclasses that inherit from the given metaclass.

        The given metaclass will in the result list.

        Parameters:
        metaclass - The parent metaclass of the wanted metaclasses.
        Returns:
        A list of metaclasses that inherit from the given metaclass.

      • getMetamodel

        MMetamodel getMetamodel()
        Get the current project metamodel.
        Returns:
        the metamodel.
        Since:
        3.4

      • getI18nSupport

        IMetamodelI18nSupport getI18nSupport()
        Returns:
        the I18n services for metamodel elements
        Since:
        4.0
